name: Vim Dish Wash Bar
description: Vim dishwashing soap with the power of 100 limes removes tough stains and gives a pleasant cleaning experience with its refreshing lime fragrance. Provides a superior & faster clean than a laundry soap while removing tough stains & even soot. Also, Vim bar is better and faster on all types of kitchenware.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
